text: I have been using "Manuka Honey" for the past 6 months and am so happy that Amazon has it in stock...it's hard to find. I use it every morning together with my oatmeal and not only is the taste wonderful but my cholestorol and blood pressure has gone down.  Manuka is also known for stomach ulcers, stomach disorders and other illness.  Everyone should use it ....Rochelleds
